Little Battlers eXperience (Danball Senki) - Season 1 - Episode 10 (WEBRip - 720p)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Van Yamano wanted an LBX robot more than anything else in the world, but his mother
always refused. And then one day fate brought him his very own LBX named Achilles.
A naturally gifted LBX player, Van soon finds himself battling to free his missing
father from the clutches of an evil organization. But what Van doesn't know is that
his LBX Achilles holds the key to the fate of the entire world. He will soon find
himself caught in the midst of a vast conspiracy for global domination with the
highest ranks of power. It's up to Van to defend the world from tyranny depending
solely on his own unique abilities and his LBX robots.

Produced by TV Tokyo, Dentsu and OLM.


The C.I.O. come face to face with Cillian Kaido. Van finally meets his father,
but they&apos;ll need to be sharp if they want to escape from the N.D.R. leader.
